data.message: What about the stupid game invites?! How do we turn that garbage off? I know my friends are not sending them to me, its Facebook that is.

replies.message: Hi Russell. When you block an app or game, it won't be able to access any of your Facebook information or send you any requests. If you no longer want an app or game to contact you, please remove it: https://www.facebook.com/help/170585223002660 -Hailey
I don't have any games on my phone and I don't play games, but I still get invites every single day.
Sagheer Ahmed Mukhtiar Ali Panhwar Noshad Panhwar Navid Ahmed Akash Ali Amjed Ali Metlo
Agree 100% i want game request blocking!
Someone please delete the spam posted by Meknassi!
If you just click through the invite there is a button right under it to block the game or the app. So, you never get invites for it again.
No there isn't Cara! The link just takes the user to that game in the app store! There is no option for blocking the stupid, fu@king game invite!
